meanings.definition: All the inhabitants of a particular town, area, or country.
meanings.sent1: The populations in our town are very diverse.
meanings.sent2: The populations of different cities vary greatly.
meanings.sent3: The populations at the town meeting seemed to be in a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: The populations of birds in the park create a symphony of chirps.
meanings.sent5: The populations of students in the school make it a vibrant community.

meanings.definition: The total number of people living in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The populations in the city have been steadily increasing.
meanings.sent2: The populations of different countries can be quite large.
meanings.sent3: The populations waiting in line for ice cream were getting impatient.
meanings.sent4: The populations of stars in the sky create a mesmerizing view.
meanings.sent5: The populations of fans at the concert made the atmosphere electric.

meanings.definition: The number or range of organisms living in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The populations of fish in the lake are thriving.
meanings.sent2: The populations of insects in the garden are essential for pollination.
meanings.sent3: The populations of squirrels in the park seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The populations of bacteria in the soil play a crucial role in decomposition.
meanings.sent5: The populations of trees in the forest create a lush green canopy.
